## StreamDefinition type

Union of all supported stream definition variants.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type StreamDefinition<TRequest, TRaw, TResponse> = NdjsonStreamDefinition<TRequest, TRaw, TResponse> | SseStreamDefinition<TRequest, TRaw, TResponse> | WebsocketStreamDefinition<TRequest, TRaw, TResponse>;
```
**References:** [NdjsonStreamDefinition](./rtsk.ndjsonstreamdefinition.md)<!-- -->, [SseStreamDefinition](./rtsk.ssestreamdefinition.md)<!-- -->, [WebsocketStreamDefinition](./rtsk.websocketstreamdefinition.md)
